segments.text: I see a boy climbing on a wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar in the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His determination is admirable, yet the risk he’s taking is palpable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can already imagine the stool tipping over, sending him crashing to the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him is eagerly waiting, her arm raised, anticipating a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s as if they are in this mischievous conspiracy, stealing sweets while the adult remains unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus on the dish is so intense that she doesn’t even glance their way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Every moment feels like it could lead to disaster, and yet they seem blissfully unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR
